text: Anante nagra antahige'na, ama vahe'zaga zamagra na'a hunaku neaze hu'na antahigogeno, amanage hu'ne. Ama 4'a pazivemo'za Juda vahera zamahe panani hazage'za panani hu'za fre'naze. Hianagi menima neaza vahe'mo'za ama ana 4'a pazivetamina, e'i 4'a kumate vahetaminki'za zamazeri zamagogonefe'za zamazeri haviza hunaku neaze.
